name: United Commune of people
startIntroPart1: Working Men of All Countries, Unite! The revolution will continue, even though the human history has reached its lowest point, to that, we shall fix it and fix the reactionary force at the same time, let us rebuild a new world of the proletarians!
attacked: All reactionary force are mere fake tigers made out of paper, and you will strand in ocean of the people's war.
defeated: The revolution wont die, as long as there are exploits, there will be revolt.
introduction: I'm Li De sheng, I stand for proletarians of the world, if you are not reactionary scum, we could have some allies.
neutralHello: Chairman Li De sheng is speaking.
hateHello: You are to be hanged on a lamp post, if you even have any.
tradeRequest: Trading materials is good for development, isn't it?
uniques: [Personnel] units gain the [Guerilla Warfare I] promotion
[{Land} {Low Tech}] units gain the [Guerilla Warfare I] promotion
Each city founded increases culture cost of policies [+25]% less than normal

civilopediaText.text: Working Men of All Countries, Unite! The revolution will continue, even though the human history has reached its lowest point, to that, we shall fix it and fix the reactionary force at the same time, let us rebuild a new world of the proletarians!
